satellite_network_attribute_functions.time_visibility module¶

satellite_network_attribute_functions.time_visibility.time_visibility_function(snapshot_num: int, total_satellites: int, initial_id_num: int, constellation_name: str)[source]¶

For a given snapshot, calculates how long each pair of satellites within the network will remain visible to one another (in terms of number of future snapshots).

Parameters:

  • snapshot_num – the number of satellites within the network

  • total_satellites

  • initial_id_num

  • constellation_name

Returns:

LEO_Satellite_Network_Topology_Design
